messages.subject: Fw: Important information about media coverage for Ralph
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Washington Nader 2000  To:  Sent: Monday, September 11, 2000 2:20 P Subject: Important information
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Washington Nader 2000 <n20001@...>
To: <earthmagik@...>
Sent: Monday, September 11, 2000 2:20 P
Subject: Important information about media coverage for Ralph


> Dear Nader Supporters,
>
> Help turn the tide of media neglect! Help empower the American voting
> public! Ralph Nader's message must be heard! Join with thousands of
> Nader supporters this THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 14, 2000 to demand MEDIA
> COVERAGE FOR NADER, NOW! We can make a difference!. Beginning at 8:00
> AM EST on SEPTEMBER 14, 2000 conact CNN. Demand MEDIA COVERAGE FOR
> NADER,NOW!. Email CNN (editor@...), phone CNN (1 404
827-1500)or
> fax CNN (1 404 878-0891). Demonstrate the power of an
> informed citizenry! Please pass this email along to your lists.
>
> Toward the best choice for America,
> Marianne Alexy Gregor
> Sag Harbor, New York
> ___________________________________________________________________
> You are receiving this email because you signed up on the Volunteer
> Form at Votenader.org, or are on the lists of the Seattle Greens, or
> Washington Green Party. You have been bcc'd to help protect your privacy,
> and to prevent "reply-all"s.
>
> We DON'T want to bother folks who don't want these emails, so please let
us
> know if you'd prefer NOT to receive future updates about the Nader
Campaign
> and Local Green Party activities in your area. Either way, you won't be
> inundated with mails on this distribution.
>
> Thanks!
>
